articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Ukrainian military said Russia launched 206 drones, 2 ballistic and 7 other missiles overnight.
articles.title: Russian attack on Ukraine's Kharkiv kills three, wounds 22, mayor says

articles.author: Nandita Bose
articles.description: The falling-out began brewing days ago when Musk denounced Trump's tax-cut and spending bill.
articles.title: Trump is not interested in talking to Musk as they feud over tax-cut bill

articles.author: Crispian Balmer, Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: As Palestinians across the war-ravaged Gaza Strip marked the start of Eid al-Adha, Israeli forces continued military operations.
articles.title: Overcrowding forces halt to Gaza aid distribution, Eid holiday marked by violence

articles.author: Panarat Thepgumpanat, Devjyot Ghoshal
articles.description: Thailand has reinforced its military presence along a disputed border with Cambodia, following an increase in troops on the other side, Thailand's defence minister said on Saturday, as tensions simmer following a deadly clash.
articles.title: Thailand and Cambodia reinforcing troops on disputed border after May skirmish, Thai minister says

articles.author: Jane Ross, Steve Gorman
articles.description: Reuters video showed Los Angeles Police Department officers lined up on a downtown street wielding batons and what appeared to be tear gas rifles.
articles.title: Riot police, anti-ICE protesters square off in Los Angeles after raids

articles.author: Mark Trevelyan, Tom Balmforth
articles.description: The strikes dealt a powerful symbolic blow to a country that, throughout the Ukraine war, has frequently reminded the world of its nuclear might.
articles.title: Russia faces struggle to replace bombers lost in Ukrainian drone strikes

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Israeli military has retrieved the body of Thai hostage, Nattapong Pinta, who had been held in Gaza since Hamas' October 7, 2023 attack on Israel, Defence Minister Israel Katz said on Saturday.
articles.title: Israeli military retrieves body of Thai hostage from Gaza, defence minister says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine's air forces shot down a Russian Su-35 fighter jet on Saturday morning, the Ukrainian military said.
articles.title: Ukraine says it shot down Russian Su-35 fighter jet

articles.author: Daniel Trotta
articles.description: LGBTQ+ people from around the world will march through the streets of Washington on Saturday in a joyful celebration meant to show defiance to President Donald Trump's rollback of queer rights.
articles.title: WorldPride attendees to march through Washington in defiance of Trump

articles.author: Jonathan Landay
articles.description: Sources say $500 million will be given to the Gaza Humanitarian Foundation and would come from the USAID, which is being folded into the U.S. State Department.
articles.title: Exclusive: US mulls giving millions to controversial Gaza aid foundation, sources say
